channel.title: teaching on Carlo Cavicchia
channel.description: Recent content in teaching on Carlo Cavicchia

item.title: teaching material
item.description: supervisions I am currently supervising three msc theses on Data Science for Marketing Analytics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising three msc theses on Econometrics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising six bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Adachi and Trendafilov (2018) last year I supervised eight bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Vichi and Kiers (2001) and Bluszcz (2016)
